entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
